overview:
Soleio was an early Facebook designer (2005â€“2011) where he conceptualized and designed core products and features.

Soleio spearheaded the development of early applications such as Notes, Links and Video. He is also responsible for designing the site’s Like feature and commenting systems. He oversaw Facebook’s visual standards and common interface patterns, later acting as lead designer of Messages, Groups and Chat.

Since leaving Facebook, Soleio has spent his time advising technology companies and raising his firstborn. He holds a bachelor’s degree in music composition from Duke University.
